name: Raritan
overview: Raritan Computer, Inc. manufactures KVM, serial, power, monitoring, and management solutions. It provides solutions that monitor, access, control, and manage servers and other IT devices in data centers, server rooms, and remote offices. The companyâ€™s products include KVM-over-IP switches that provide BIOS-level access and control of servers over LAN, WAN, Internet connection, or dialup; analog KVM switches, which offer the power to access and control servers and other network devices in data center or server room; and power management solutions that allow IT administrators and facilities managers to monitor, access, and control power at the rack. It also provides serial console solutions, which offer control of serial devices, such as routers, switches, firewalls, and servers; network monitoring hardware and virtual monitoring appliances; and centralized management solutions, which offer a granular system for controlling and auditing various user and administrator transactions. In addition, the company provides embedded server management products that offer architecture for server OEM, motherboard manufacturer, system builder, or other embedded computing solutions; and a range of device accessories and rack management solutions. It provides solutions for data centers, server rooms, power management, remote office management, government, disaster recovery/hosted/colocation, desktop/small office, and computer server manufacturers. Raritan Computer, Inc. has a strategic technology partnership with Innovative Research. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Somerset, New Jersey with operations in Zwickau, Germany.

milestones.description: Raritan Receives Equity Investment from NewSpring Capital
milestones.source_description: Raritan Receives Equity Investment from NewSpring Capital
